subject: Sales
title: Silence as a Power Tool
description: A fast breakdown of Silence as a Power Tool for builders.

hook.text: After the pitch, the seller goes silent. Ten seconds feel like forever. The buyer speaks first.

buildup.text: Most sellers fear silence and rush to fill it. But silence creates space for the buyer to process.

discovery.text: Studies show people reveal more information after pauses. Silence is an invitation to think out loud.

twist.text: The discomfort is genuine. But whoever breaks the silence first usually concedes power in the exchange.

climax.text: Practice a three-second pause after every key statement. Let your words land before adding more.

punchline.text: In sales, silence speaks louder than any pitch.

quiz.question: Why is silence powerful in a sales conversation?
options: It gives the buyer space to process and often reveal more
